recipes.name: Pasta with tomato sauce
instructions: Drain the pasta, while keeping some of the water that it cooked in.
Mix the drained pasta into the sauce, adding some of the pasta water until everything has a good consistency.

variations.name: Tagliatelle
instructionGroups: Knead {Flour:quantity}, some salt and {Egg(s):quantity} into a smooth dough that springs back to the touch.
After waiting for at least 30 minutes, roll out the dough.
Set the rolled out dough to dry until parchment-like. This should take about an hour or two.
After having rolled up the dough, cut it into small strips.
Pour all of your pasta in the boiling water

variations.name: Dry pasta
instructionGroups: Pour your pasta, following the instructions on the packet, in the boiling water.

variationGroups.groupName: Type of base for the sauce

variations.name: Soffritto
instructionGroups: Assemble everything in a hot pan with {Olive oil:quantity} and cook until golden brown.

variations.name: Onions and garlic
instructionGroups: Cook the onions in a hot pan with {Olive oil:quantity} until golden brown.
Add in the garlic and stir for about 30 seconds.

variations.name: Crushed baby tomatoes
instructionGroups: Add in about {Baby tomato(es):quantity} to the pan and cover until the skin starts to split.
Either mash up the tomatoes or wait for them to cook down to a saucy consistency.

variations.name: Canned tomato sauce
instructionGroups: Add in {Can(s) of tomato sauce:quantity} and cook until thickened
